name: Angel Present
summary: Angel Present takes place in a 2.5D environment with adventure elements in 2 different worlds, with 3d battles. The game mixes these more action-based elements, with static screens and text and CG movies. The story centers around the main protagonist stumbling across a fairy and soon discovering they have magical powers.
